%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c.checkLabel: By typing your name below, you are hereby signing this document. I, the undersigned,  represent that the person listed as the applicant on this application is under 18 years of  age and is making application for [Insert Name] health coverage with my full knowledge  and consent.
%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c.label: Statement of Understanding
%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c.text: I understand that if the individuals listed on this application are accepted, I agree: (a) to abide by the constitution, bylaws and terms and conditions of the plan, and (b) to provide information about my child's and/or my treatment or condition. I agree to the terms set forth in this application and acknowledge that I am signing this application under penalty of perjury which means I have provided true answers to all the questions on this form to the best of my knowledge. I confirm that no one applying for health insurance on this application is incarcerated (detained or jailed). I agree that [Insert Name] will set the date on which my coverage will begin. I understand that I must pay monthly premiums in advance.
